alert.note: Alert for Gila; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 10:51PM MST until August 14 at 12:30AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE BACKBONE FIRE SCAR BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MST SUNDAY FOR GILA AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES... At 1048 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that rain has ended over the Backbone Fire scar. Between 0.75 and 1.25 inches of rain fell earlier this evening and is likely producing flash flooding in Fossil Creek. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Backbone Fire scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Backbone Fire scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Childs Power Plant. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Fossil Creek, Houston Creek, Hardscrabble Creek and Verde River. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Backbone Fire scar. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
